quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: But I can see here that I did ask them for an update, they haven't given me one yet.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: So I will chase again for you.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: But surely you've got a name, that's—

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I've got the inbox name. Because it's rotational, it doesn't come back with an individual name.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: And that's why it's a little bit frustrating, because I don't have a direct contact as well.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: But I did ask for a sergeant name to be provided.

contradictions.issue: Emma claims to request sergeant name but only has rotational inbox contact

timeline_hooks.link: Systemic issue in stalking unit contact management
